scripts.name: echo npm_package_name
scripts.precover:
#收集覆盖率之前把之前的覆盖率报告目录清理掉 
 rm -rf coverage
scripts.cover:
#直接调用 nyc，让其生成 html 格式的覆盖率报告 
 nyc --reporter=html npm run mocha
scripts.postcover:
#整理测试报告以版本号来进行们每次测试报告的文件归档 
 mkdir -p coverage_archive/$npm_package_version && cp -r coverage/* coverage_archive/$npm_package_version && rm -rf ./coverage && rm -rf ./.nyc_output && http-server coverage_archive/$npm_package_version -p $npm_package_config_port
